name: Etika: Red and Blue - Episode 1
description:
Etika: Red and Blue, is told through the eyes of a college girl who just graduated, after leaving her hometown in Michigan due to a incident of her past, she moves to New York, the bustling city full of dreams and hope, soon she finds out that starting over isn't easy, and she ends up meeting Desmond Amofa (Etika), who seems to be a veteran to the city. Hijinks ensue as she gets into shenanigans with Etika, his friends, and soon falls in love with him, but, her past doesn't seem to quit, as her demons start to creep up on her and it seems like the only way to truly put her old life behind her is face them and fall in love again.Including:
  • Peaceful soundtrack.
  • Beautiful 2D Art.
  • Engaging and gripping story.
  • Multiple endings based on the choices you make.
